round single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch space space © merrian holland 2021 www mezzacraft com ♥ please do not share or copy this pattern in any format please do share the link to this pattern ♥ thank you ♥ p age 3 | 5 round 1 with colour a ch4 and join with a slip_stitch in 1st chain to form a ring * in the ring - 1sc ch3 8 times join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet made fasten_off colour a 8sts 8ch3 sps alternative method if you don t like the look of the slip_stitch join work as to * then in the ring - 1sc ch3 7 times 1sc ch2 make a sewn bind off for the last chain as follows - cut the yarn and pull the live loop open until the tail end pops out thread the tail end onto a needle insert the needle into the 1st single_crochet made in the same way as you would a crochet hook i e from front to back and through both loops turn the work and thread the needle down through the 2nd chain being careful not to pull the chain tight & making sure you catch the back loop and back ridge of the chain gently adjust the mock chain you ve just created until it matches the rest of the sts secure the tail end into the ring 8sts 8ch3 sps round 2 join colour b in a ch3 space but preferable not the one you ve ended round 1 with ch5 counts as 1dc & a ch2 space 2dc in same space 2dc in next ch3 space in next ch3 space make a corner 2dc ch2 2dc 3 times 2dc in last ch3 space finish off the 1st corner in 1st ch3 space make 1dc finish with a slip_stitch join in 3rd chain of beg chain 5 or for a neater look finish with a sewn bind off in the 4th chain 3 x 2dc clusters on each side 4 x
